messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR ROSS THOMSON
messages.content:
Fresh Face - Ross represents the new kind of politics we need to connect with real people and restore faith and trust in politics - for example his pledge to fight a clean campaign.
Passionate - Ross has the energy and passion to stand up for local people at Westminster and ensure that Gordon’s needs are represented.
Make Gordon Better - Ross is fighting to dual the A96 and A90, reopen the station at Kintore, and to get a third Don crossing.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting to dual the A96 and A90, reopen the station at Kintore, and to get a third Don crossing.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am a local lad. I know our area and about Gordon. I know that I can be a strong voice at Westminster for our local communities.

endorsements.endorsement: We can’t go on like this. We need change to put Britain back on its feet.

images.caption: Ross Thomson at a local farm
